page.title: 02THE RADAR STATION
page.content: THE RADAR STATION WAS BUILT IN{1938. IT WAS ONE OF THE FIRST OF IT 'S KIND. IT CONSISTED OF{4 RECIVERS AND 4 {TRANSMITERS.}AMONGST THE BUILDINGS WERE WALLED NISSEN HUTS AND A CENTRAL BUNKER IN WHICH THE RADAR EQUIPMENT WAS HOUSED. AROUND THE STATION THERE ARE MANY BUNKERS. IT WAS USED IN THE {BATTLE OF BRITIAN}AS AN EARLY WARNING SYSTEM FOR THE FIGHTER SQUADRONS. NEARBY A{NAZI BOMBER}CRASHED. NEARBY HOUSES WERE USED AS ACCOMODATION FOR OFFICERS AT THE STATION. THE STATION WENT OUT OF SERVICE IN{1960.}ONE OF THE TRANSMITERS STILL STANDS AND IS USED BY BRITISH GAS. THE REMAINS OF THE STATION ARE STILL IN REASONABLE CONDITION. {By M.Semple & E.Stevens {
